SELECT contents_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, adminno, cateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, salecnt) VALUES(#{contentsno}, #{adminno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{salecnt})
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, adminno, cateno, title, content, word, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point FROM contents WHERE cateno = #{cateno} ORDER BY contentsno ASC

SELECT contentsno, adminno, cateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point FROM contents
WHERE cateno=#{cateno}
WHERE cateno=#{cateno} AND (title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
